name: 🍡 Miss Kitty Lime Pie 🍡
bio: Good morning! I'm 🍡 Miss Kitty Lime Pie 🍡. I want to live in a world where people believe that one day cats will rule this planet. Sometimes I daydream of a life full of fighting the patriarchy, cantaloupe, and watching reality tv. Purrhaps this is the beginning of a beautiful relationship.
